import React from "react"; const Cart = ({ cart, changeQuantity }) => { const total = (item)=> { cart.map( (item) => item.total) } return (

Cart

Book Quantity Price
{cart.map((book) => { return (
{book.title} ${(book.salePrice||book.originalPrice.toFixed(2))}
changeQuantity(book, event.target.value)} />
${((book.salePrice||book.originalPrice) * book.quantity).toFixed(2)}
); })}
Subtotal
Tax $1.00
Total $10.00
); }; export default Cart;
